Classes

class  plBayesianNetwork
 Simple helper for building a Bayesian network and using it for exact inference using discrete variables (continuous variables are allowed only when used as evidence ones). More...

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum plInferenceAlgorithm

Inference algorithm to be used in plBayesianNetwork::set_inference_algorithm().

Enumerator
PL_JT 

"Junction Tree" algorithm.

PL_SR 

"Successive Restrictions" algorithm (a kind of variable elimination).

enum plStructureLearningScore

Scores to be used for structure learning.

Enumerator
PL_MI 

Mutual Information edge score.

PL_MI_DIST 

Normalized metric variant of the Mutual Information edge score: D(X,Y) = I(X,Y) / H(X,Y).

PL_ENTROPY 

Entropy edge score.

PL_BIC 

Bayesian Information Criterion (node and edge score).

PL_AIC 

Akaike's Information Criterion (node and edge score).

PL_MDL 

Minimum Description Length (node and edge score).
